attributes.action: introduce a keyboard shortcut to change the Dodge tool's Range.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's about time that MPs sat up and took notice of the need for a keyboard shortcut to change the Range setting of the Dodge and Burn tools in Photoshop. 

Having to access this from the Options bar wastes literally 10s of seconds of man-hours a year.

Something must be done!?

rejection.details: You should address your comments to the makers of the product in the first instance.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
